snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes detours taken by journalism school graduates and a look at why Apple never uses last names in its recruiting...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes detours taken by journalism school graduates and a look at why Apple never uses last names in its recruiting videos.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Music Predicts Politics and $50 for Tips
